query: SELECT COUNT(*) as job_count, SUM(CASE WHEN isPublic = 1 AND status = 'active' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as public_active_jobs FROM jobs;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user Qn11raqpZKapJrc.584a41145ea0 --database myxzroeDB4HgZWmTgbS8PA --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as job_count, SUM(CASE WHEN isPublic = 1 AND status = 'active' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as public_active_jobs FROM jobs;
